column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////When I got home in LA
column2: I finally had a chance to experience a piece of Chicago. For some reason
column3: I was expecting a thick greasy crust sauced with oil...instead
column4: when I took a bite into it
column5: I found that there was more sauce than cheese
column6: and the bottom of the crust was dry (corn-mealy like). At first
column7: I was wondering what the heck was wrong with the pizza (I'm sure Chicago'ans are laughing at this review right now). But as I kept eating
column8: it made me want to eat more and more! Don't get me wrong
column9: I'm sure I still gained 5 lbs by eating the pizza
column11: I loved it!...and now I have handles to hold on to!
